column.name: ACCOUNT_NUMBER
column.comment: This column contains a unique system defined identifier for the account.

column.name: ADJUSTMENT_ID
column.comment: This column is the unique identifier for an adjustment

column.name: CHANGE_TYPE
column.comment: Data warehouse entry last action type: "I"-Inserted, "U"-Updated, "D"-Deleted

column.name: LOADTM
column.comment: Data warehouse entry change date timestamp (Original name in the DWHDB "_LOADTM")

column.name: CREATE_DATE
column.comment: This column specifies the creation date of the adjustment.

column.name: CREATE_USER_ID
column.comment: This column specifies the creator of the adjustment.

column.name: TYPE_RD
column.comment: This column data indicates what type an adjustment is, either detailed or general.

column.name: BASE_CURRENCY_AMOUNT
column.comment: This column is the amount of the adjustment which can be a credit or debit.

column.name: STATE_RD
column.comment: This column specifies the status of the ADJUSTMENT.

column.name: PREFERRED_CURRENCY_AMOUNT
column.comment: The adjusted Amount specified in the preferred currency.

column.name: PREFERRED_CURRENCY_RD
column.comment: This field identifies what the preferred currency is.

column.name: RECURRING_DURATION
column.comment: The number of times ERP will still process a Recurring Adjustment.

column.name: START_DATE
column.comment: Date after which the adjustment will be applied.

column.name: ERP_STATE_RD
column.comment: The status of the Recurring Adjustment for the ERP point of view.

column.name: ERP_RECURRING_DURATION
column.comment: The number of times ERP will still process a Recurring Adjustment.

column.name: ERP_START_DATE
column.comment: This date specifies when ERP will process the Recurring Adjustment the  next time.

column.name: EVENT_ID
column.comment: This column is a unique identifier for the event for which the  adjustment is made.

column.name: INTERNAL_REASON_TEXT
column.comment: This column represents internal information that a Customer  Representative captures for an ADJUSTMENT

column.name: DESCRIPTION_TEXT
column.comment: This column represents a description the Customer Repesentative  entered for an ADJUSTMENT.

column.name: REASON_CODE_RD
column.comment: On GENERAL ADJUSTMENTs, this data is sent by CBM to SAP as the  unique identifier of a SERVICE. On DETAILED ADJUSTMENTs, the reason  code is informational for bill display purposes because the SERVICE  is derived from the associated EVENT.

column.name: TAX_CODE_RD
column.comment: This column represents a finite list of codes that exist  representing the various tax categories.

column.name: RESOLUTION_DATE
column.comment: This column data specifies the approval or rejection date of the  adjustment.

column.name: RESOLUTION_USER_ID
column.comment: This column specifies the user ID who approved or rejected the  adjustment.

column.name: INVOICE_ID
column.comment: The status of the Recurring Adjustment for the ERP point of view.

column.name: NEW_START_DATE
column.comment: This date is set when the recurring duration of a Recurring Adjustment  is modified. It is set to date on which the Adjustment will be  processed the first time after the modification.

column.name: PRODUCT_CODE
column.comment: This field contains the PSM Product Code for a specific Product.

column.name: INVOICE_SEQUENCE_NUMBER
column.comment: For a Detailed Adjustment, this is the Invoice Sequence Number of the  adjusted Event.

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_DATE_TIME
column.comment: Audit information capturing date and time of last update

column.name: AUDIT_UPDATE_USER_ID
column.comment: Audit information capturing user id of last update

column.name: UPDATE_NUMBER
column.comment: Version number of the row. The version number starts with a random number and is  incremented on each update.  Update and Delete operations verify that the number in the database is equal to the  number used in the SQL statement (optimistic locking).

column.name: CATEGORY
column.comment: Category of the adjustment (Original name in source system "CATEGORY")

column.name: SERVICE_SUBSCRIPTION_ID
column.comment: This column data represents the unique identifier of the SERVICE SUBSCRIPTION.

column.name: CONDITION_TYPE
column.comment: Condition type for the event

column.name: ARTICLE_CODE
column.comment: Holds the article code of the event

column.name: CUSTOMER_TRACKING_ID
column.comment: Contains the barcode of a customer order which contains an STP for the service subscription mentioned in this adjustment.

column.name: UNIT_MEASURE_ENUM
column.comment: The measure unit code

column.name: UNIT_VOLUME
column.comment: The number of units

column.name: PAYMENT_MODE
column.comment: The payment mode can be INVOICE, DIRECT or NULL

column.name: EOI_STATE_RD
column.comment: The status of the Recurring Adjustment for the EOI point of view.

column.name: KBA_TRANSACTION_NR
column.comment: This column contains the KBA transaction number

column.name: PRINT
column.comment: This column contains the print flag

column.name: FILLER
column.comment: N/A
